item.title: Covering Spaces of Wedge of Two Circles
item.description: We start with some theorems from Hatcher’s algebraic topology and will give a solution of the following exercise by enumeration. Find all the connected 2-sheeted and 3-sheeted covering spaces of $S^1 \vee S^1$​, up to isomorphism of covering spaces without basepoints. Review of Hatcher Proposition 1.32. The number of sheets of a covering space $p:(\widetilde{X}, \widetilde{x_0}) \to (X, x_0)$ with $X$ and $\widetilde{X}$ path-connected equals the index of $p_*\left(\pi_1\left(\widetilde{X}, \widetilde{x_0}\right)\right)$ in $\pi_1\left(X, x_0\right)$.
